question: 損害
sourceMnemonic:
Your <kanji>loss</kanji> comes from <kanji>damage</kanji> done to you. This is <vocabulary>damage</vocabulary>.

This word is usually used as a noun. It can occasionally be turned into verb by adding <ja>する</ja>, but this is very rare!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
